show_thumbnail.description: Show or hide content fields without the need to delete the content itself.
show_thumbnail.text: Show the navigation thumbnail instead of the image

slideshow_height.label: Height
slideshow_height.description:
The slideshow always takes up full width, and the height will adapt automatically based on the defined ratio. Alternatively, the height can adapt to the height of the viewport.

Note: Make sure no height is set in the section settings when using one of the viewport options.

slideshow_ratio.label: Ratio
slideshow_ratio.description: Set the slideshow ratio. It's recommended to use the same ratio as the image or video file. Simply use its width and height, e.g. 1600:900.

slideshow_min_height.label: Min Height
slideshow_min_height.description: Use an optional minimum height to prevent the slideshow from becoming smaller than its content on small devices.

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.description: Set light or dark color mode for text, buttons and controls.

slideshow_box_shadow.label: Box Shadow
slideshow_box_shadow.description: Select the slideshow box shadow size.

slideshow_box_decoration.label: Box Decoration
slideshow_box_decoration.description: Select the image box decoration style.

slideshow_animation.label: Transition
slideshow_animation.description: Select the transition between two slides.

slideshow_velocity.label: Velocity
slideshow_velocity.description: Set the velocity in pixels per millisecond.

slideshow_autoplay_interval.label: Interval
slideshow_autoplay_interval.description: Set the autoplay interval in seconds.

slideshow_kenburns.label: Ken Burns Effect
slideshow_kenburns.description: Select the transformation origin for the Ken Burns animation.

slideshow_kenburns_duration.label: Duration
slideshow_kenburns_duration.description: Set the duration for the Ken Burns effect in seconds.

nav_position.label: Position
nav_position.description: Select the position of the navigation.

nav_position_margin.label: Margin
nav_position_margin.description: Apply a margin between the navigation and the slideshow container.

nav_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
nav_breakpoint.description: Display the navigation only on this device width and larger.

nav_color.label: Color
nav_color.description: Set light or dark color if the navigation is below the slideshow.

thumbnav_nowrap.label: Thumbnav Wrap
thumbnav_nowrap.description: Define whether thumbnails wrap into multiple lines if the container is too small.

thumbnav_svg_inline.label: Thumbnav Inline SVG
thumbnav_svg_inline.description: Inject SVG images into the page markup so that they can easily be styled with CSS.

thumbnav_svg_color.label: Thumbnav SVG Color
thumbnav_svg_color.description: Select the SVG color. It will only apply to supported elements defined in the SVG.

slidenav.label: Position
slidenav.description: Select the position of the slidenav.

slidenav_margin.label: Margin
slidenav_margin.description: Apply a margin between the slidenav and the slideshow container.

slidenav_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
slidenav_breakpoint.description: Display the slidenav only on this device width and larger.

slidenav_outside_breakpoint.label: Outside Breakpoint
slidenav_outside_breakpoint.description: Display the slidenav outside only on this device width and larger. Otherwise, display it inside.

slidenav_outside_color.label: Outside Color
slidenav_outside_color.description: Set light or dark color if the slidenav is outside.

overlay_container.label: Container Width
overlay_container.description: Set the maximum content width. Note: The section may already have a maximum width, which you cannot exceed.

overlay_container_padding.label: Container Padding
overlay_container_padding.description: Set the vertical container padding to position the overlay.

overlay_margin.label: Margin
overlay_margin.description: Set the margin between the overlay and the slideshow container.

overlay_style.label: Style
overlay_style.description: Select a style for the overlay.

overlay_padding.label: Padding
overlay_padding.description: Set the padding between the overlay and its content.

overlay_animation.label: Animation
overlay_animation.description: Choose between a parallax depending on the scroll position or an animation, which is applied once the slide is active.

image_loading.label: Loading
image_loading.description: By default, images are loaded lazy. Enable eager loading for images in the initial viewport.

title_style.label: Style
title_style.description: Title styles differ in font-size but may also come with a predefined color, size and font.

title_decoration.label: Decoration
title_decoration.description: Decorate the title with a divider, bullet or a line that is vertically centered to the heading.

title_font_family.label: Font Family
title_font_family.description: Select an alternative font family. Mind that not all styles have different font families.

title_color.label: Color
title_color.description: Select the text color. If the Background option is selected, styles that don't apply a background image use the primary color instead.

title_element.label: HTML Element
title_element.description: Choose one of the HTML elements to fit the semantic structure.

title_margin.label: Margin Top
title_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

meta_style.label: Style
meta_style.description: Select a predefined meta text style, including color, size and font-family.

meta_element.label: HTML Element
meta_element.description: Choose one of the HTML elements to fit the semantic structure.

meta_margin.label: Margin Top
meta_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

content_style.label: Style
content_style.description: Select a predefined text style, including color, size and font-family.

content_margin.label: Margin Top
content_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

link_text.label: Text
link_text.description: Enter the text for the link.

link_margin.label: Margin Top
link_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

css.label: CSS
css.description: Enter your own custom CSS. The following selectors will be prefixed automatically for this element: .el-element, .el-item, .el-nav, .el-slidenav, .el-image, .el-overlay, .el-title, .el-meta, .el-content, .el-link

fields.label: Thumbnail Width/Height
fields.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.

fields.label: Width/Height
fields.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.
